EmailTemplate.name: BANTWHR Ignite Update
EmailTemplate.subject: IGNITE - East London 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello NCS Grad!
Ignite East London 2014 is 5 hour event, with professional speed networking, and amazing workshops run by DV8, London Youth and Uprising, to name a few!
This event is currently SOLD OUT - however, due to demand, we will be RE-RELEASING 70 new tickets. These tickets will be released on MONDAY 17TH NOVEMBER at 5.00pm sharp. Please keep an eye on your e-mail to make sure you don't miss out!
This will be the LAST CHANCE to get an Ignite ticket this year - please note, once these final 70 tickets have been sold, there will be no more releases.
If you have any questions, feel free to drop us an e-mail at katie.kitney@the-challenge.org.
The Challenge Society.
